--- select_singer_with_where.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerID = 1

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      46,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  25,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   25,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where: &parser.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  34,
        end:  42,
        Name: "SingerID",
      },
      Right: &parser.IntLit{
        pos:   45,
        end:   46,
        Value: "1",
      },
    },
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = 1
